com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Interface CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED

  • Enclosing interface:
    CardReaderCapabilities

    public static interface CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED
    CardReaderLED represents LED display screen capabilities of a card reader device. Please query this object for more detailed information on the current card reader's display screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED.Size
      A simple class used to represent the width and height of the card reader display LED.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED.Size getResolutionDimensions()
      Query the width and height variables of the Size object to get resolution dimensions of the card reader LED screen.
      boolean isBackLightPresent()
      Indicates whether the card reader display has a backlight or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isBackLightPresent

        boolean isBackLightPresent()
        Indicates whether the card reader display has a backlight or not.
        Returns:
        true if it backlight is available, false otherwise.

      • getResolutionDimensions

        CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED.Size getResolutionDimensions()
        Query the width and height variables of the Size object to get resolution dimensions of the card reader LED screen. If width and height are 0 this means resolution information could not be determined.
        Returns:
        an object indicating the width and height of the display LED.
